column5: Took advantage of the fall weather in Thunder Bay. My 87 year old dad had the urge to go. Left town at noon, back in town by 5Fish were in 30-40 feet of water, worms were every bit as good as minnows, spinner’s and bottom bouncer’s.Fish and chips tonight Fish are bled while on the stringer and then put on ice in the cooler for nice clean flesh
Nothin better than good'ol fish n chips
The fact that your 87 year old Dad had the urge to go fishing is the most awesome part........the fish and chips will be fantastic too, I'm sure! Looks like you had a great day.
Newby here,How to bleed the Walleyes?
Cut the gills while alive,makes fillets niiiiice!
I agree wholeheartedly!! I remember those days fondly and cherish them, you are a lucky man!
